text: Bob Morane is a series of platform adventure video games. It was made by Infogrames Entertainment in 1987. It was based on the character of the same name who first appeared in comic books. == List of video games == *Bob Morane: Chevalerie 1 (1987) *Bob Morane: Science Fiction 1 (1987) *Bob Morane: Jungle 1 (1987) *Bob Morane: Oceans 1 (1988) ==References== Category:1987 establishments Category:Video game series
title: Bob Morane (video game series)
